news.title: CityUHK Ranks Among Top Universities
news.summary: CityU continues to excel in global university rankings, securing top positions in multiple disciplines
news.content: City University of Hong Kong has achieved remarkable success in the latest global university rankings, maintaining its position among the world's top institutions. The university's commitment to innovation and research excellence has been recognized across multiple disciplines...
news.author: University Communications

news.title: New Research Center Opens
news.summary: State-of-the-art AI research facility inaugurated with cutting-edge technology
news.content: The newly established Artificial Intelligence Research Center at CityU was officially inaugurated today, featuring state-of-the-art facilities and advanced computing resources. The center will focus on breakthrough research in machine learning, computer vision, and natural language processing...
news.author: Research Office

news.title: Student Exchange Programs
news.summary: Applications now open for international exchange programs with partner universities
news.content: CityU is pleased to announce that applications for international exchange programs are now open. Students can apply for semester or year-long exchanges with our partner universities across Asia, Europe, and North America. The deadline for applications is November 15, 2024...
news.author: Student Affairs Office

news.title: Sustainability Initiative Launch
news.summary: CityU launches comprehensive campus sustainability program
news.content: City University of Hong Kong has launched an ambitious sustainability initiative aimed at achieving carbon neutrality by 2030. The comprehensive program includes renewable energy adoption, waste reduction measures, and green building certifications...
news.author: Facilities Management

news.title: Alumni Success Stories
news.summary: Recent graduates share their career achievements and entrepreneurial ventures
news.content: This month we celebrate the remarkable achievements of our recent alumni who have made significant impacts in their respective fields. From successful startups to leadership roles in multinational corporations, CityU graduates continue to excel...
news.author: Alumni Relations

cap.title: Photography Workshop
cap.description: Learn basic photography techniques and composition skills
cap.fullDescription: Join our comprehensive photography workshop where you'll learn fundamental techniques including lighting, composition, and digital editing. Perfect for beginners who want to improve their photography skills.

cap.title: Community Service Project
cap.description: Volunteer at local elderly center and engage in meaningful activities
cap.fullDescription: Participate in our community service project at a local elderly center. Activities include organizing games, sharing stories, and helping with daily activities. A rewarding experience that builds empathy and social responsibility.

cap.title: Leadership Training
cap.description: Develop essential leadership skills through interactive workshops
cap.fullDescription: Comprehensive leadership development program covering communication skills, team management, conflict resolution, and strategic thinking. Includes case studies and practical exercises.

cap.title: Entrepreneurship Bootcamp
cap.description: Learn startup fundamentals and pitch your business ideas
cap.fullDescription: Intensive bootcamp covering business model development, market research, financial planning, and pitching skills. Participants will develop their own business ideas and present to a panel of investors.

cap.title: Environmental Conservation Trip
cap.description: Participate in marine conservation activities at local beaches
cap.fullDescription: Join our environmental conservation trip to local beaches where you'll participate in cleanup activities, learn about marine ecosystems, and contribute to environmental protection efforts.

cityutube.title: Campus Tour 2024
cityutube.description: Virtual tour of CityU campus facilities and student life
cityutube.fullDescription: Take a comprehensive virtual tour of our beautiful campus, featuring state-of-the-art facilities, libraries, laboratories, recreational areas, and student residences. Perfect for prospective students and their families.
cityutube.transcript: Welcome to City University of Hong Kong. Join us on this virtual tour as we explore our vibrant campus...

cityutube.title: Research Spotlight: AI Innovation
cityutube.description: Latest research breakthroughs in artificial intelligence at CityU
cityutube.fullDescription: Discover the cutting-edge AI research being conducted at CityU's laboratories. This video showcases recent breakthroughs in machine learning, computer vision, and natural language processing.
cityutube.transcript: Artificial Intelligence research at CityU is pushing the boundaries of what's possible...

cityutube.title: Student Success Stories
cityutube.description: Alumni sharing their inspiring career journeys and achievements
cityutube.fullDescription: Hear from successful CityU alumni as they share their career journeys, challenges overcome, and achievements. Featuring graduates from various disciplines who have made significant impacts in their fields.
cityutube.transcript: My journey at CityU began four years ago when I enrolled in the Computer Science program...

cityutube.title: International Students Guide
cityutube.description: Essential information for international students at CityU
cityutube.fullDescription: Comprehensive guide for international students covering visa requirements, accommodation options, cultural adaptation, academic support services, and campus resources.
cityutube.transcript: Starting your journey as an international student at CityU is an exciting adventure...

cityutube.title: Sports and Recreation Facilities
cityutube.description: Overview of CityU's sports facilities and recreational activities
cityutube.fullDescription: Explore CityU's extensive sports and recreation facilities including the Sports Complex, swimming pool, gymnasium, tennis courts, and various recreational programs available to students.
cityutube.transcript: CityU offers world-class sports and recreation facilities to promote student wellness...
